summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 1 to 11, inclusive, Block 1, Lots 1 to 6, inclusive, Block 2, Robertson's Addition, and Lots 1 to 3, inclusive, Block 7, Magnolia Heights Addition, with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto one new section numbered 2-64.
